channel.title: TripPk Version 2, Returning Soon
channel.description:
Welcome to TripPk.
Owners - GanGHack & Absynth Revision - 317 Base - DeathlyPvpzV4 Our Website - [url=http://www.trip-gaming.org]http://www.trip-gaming.org[/url]
I strongly believe in order to have a functional, popular server you must work with the players, not against them. In other words, we like to hear feedback from our players, regardless of how small or large the project may be we do encourage suggestions to improve.
Before anyone says " DeathlyPvpz isn't a very good source, i probably wont join your server. " I have spent around 3-4 months on this project, setting up the way i wanted it to be. Removing useless variables & methods, Saving as much space as possible, which in-turn saves you space. I still have alot more to do, but here is a list of everything done.
We have amazing staff, a good economy. Many money-making methods. No dupes. No lag. No downtime. We host on a secure vps " virtual private server " Rewards are not sold for donations, we give you rewards for your kind donations. We do NOT sell staff positions. We do not tolerate hacking. We allow using bots to an extent.
Our Rules Have fun, Dont be a troll. No flaming over yell. Duping will not be tolerated. Using bot clients to an extent is okay. No multi-logging to receive a second starter. No racism. No homophobic slurs.
Green = Finished Orange = Still working on it. Red = Haven't started.
Added Reputation Points - Earned by helping players, or being very well known around the server. You can then use these in a shop. Or you can save them, & trade them for a trial period of donator. will vary on how long this trial membership will last. Added new staff models - They look cooler.. Cleaned playersave -To add a more efficient way of handling character files. All bosses - working drops. Added well at home, to use vials on for water. [color=green]Added Shops Portal at home. Added FunPk Portal at home. Changed ancient altar to give the dialogue for all 3 magic books. Jarred Client. 10 Working Bosses. Fixed bugs in client Fixed a dupe method Removed login interface. 100% all working skills. Added new stalls, changed the items they give. Fixed yell command. Added player right restrictions to donator items.
Finished DonorZone, Fixed shops, added new items, removed some items. Added Donator Points - Fixed donator tab. Added more commands for donators. Removed Loyalty Points - I decided it was just in the way of things. Fixed all doors. Added Webclient
Added Donator Cape - I will soon... Dont have time with everything else to do. Fixed all trapdoors. Fixed all animations for ladders. Fixed all animations for trapdoors. Adding Grand Exchange soon. Added in-game pricelist.
Adding more update list soon.
- Our Team Currently - GanGHack - Website Developer, Owner. Absynth - Source & Client Developer, Co-owner
- Spots open - Server Developer, will receive a staff position. Forum Moderators. Server Moderators.
Pictures.
Our Client [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2hxyf53.png[/img]
Home [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2dm8hg5.png[/img]
Shops [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2coihdh.png[/img]
Changed Account menu interface, added reputation points. [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2r44oqs.png[/img]
Added ::resetmaster command, instead of using ::resetskill, this cleans it. [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2hg7r0m.png[/img]
Working Pouch [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/sce3cp.png[/img]
Working Clan Chat [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/akykns.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/6ofxv7.png[/img]
Ill add more pictures soon... Busy :x

item.title: TripPk Version 2, Returning Soon
item.dc:creator: @bob2568 bob2568
item.description:
@bob2568 wrote:

kidgoku4522:

Another deathlypvpz v4 leech oh noeeeeeez!

leech ? lol, how about reading, ive cleaned up half the shit that was in there…

Also… Would you be implying that because i’ve used a common source as a base that im a leecher ? in that case, 99% of people who advertise have leeched in 1 way or another.

Read full topic

item.title: TripPk Version 2, Returning Soon
item.dc:creator: @kidgoku4522 kidgoku4522
item.description:
@kidgoku4522 wrote:

Another deathlypvpz v4 leech oh noeeeeeez!

item.title: TripPk Version 2, Returning Soon
item.dc:creator: @bob2568 bob2568
item.description:
@bob2568 wrote:

Welcome to TripPk.

Owners - GanGHack & Absynth
Revision - 317
Base - DeathlyPvpzV4
Our Website - http://www.trip-gaming.org

I strongly believe in order to have a functional, popular server you must work with the players, not against them. In other words, we like to hear feedback from our players, regardless of how small or large the project may be we do encourage suggestions to improve.

Before anyone says " DeathlyPvpz isn’t a very good source, i probably wont join your server. " I have spent around 3-4 months on this project, setting up the way i wanted it to be. Removing useless variables & methods, Saving as much space as possible, which in-turn saves you space. I still have alot more to do, but here is a list of everything done.

We have amazing staff, a good economy.
Many money-making methods.
No dupes.
No lag.
No downtime.
We host on a secure vps " virtual private server "
Rewards are not sold for donations, we give you rewards for your kind donations.
We do NOT sell staff positions.
We do not tolerate hacking.
We allow using bots to an extent.

Our Rules
Have fun, Dont be a troll.
No flaming over yell.
Duping will not be tolerated.
Using bot clients to an extent is okay.
No multi-logging to receive a second starter.
No racism.
No homophobic slurs.

Green = Finished
Orange = Still working on it.
Red = Haven’t started.

Added Reputation Points - Earned by helping players, or being very well known around the server. You can then use these in a shop. Or you can save them, & trade them for a trial period of donator. will vary on how long this trial membership will last.
Added new staff models - They look cooler…
Cleaned playersave -To add a more efficient way of handling character files.
All bosses - working drops.
Added well at home, to use vials on for water.
[color=green]Added Shops Portal at home.
Added FunPk Portal at home.
Changed ancient altar to give the dialogue for all 3 magic books.
Jarred Client.
10 Working Bosses.
Fixed bugs in client
Fixed a dupe method
Removed login interface.
100% all working skills.
Added new stalls, changed the items they give.
Fixed yell command.
Added player right restrictions to donator items.

Finished DonorZone, Fixed shops, added new items, removed some items.
Added Donator Points - Fixed donator tab. Added more commands for donators.
Removed Loyalty Points - I decided it was just in the way of things.
Fixed all doors.
Added Webclient

Added Donator Cape - I will soon… Dont have time with everything else to do.
Fixed all trapdoors.
Fixed all animations for ladders.
Fixed all animations for trapdoors.
Adding Grand Exchange soon.
Added in-game pricelist.

Adding more update list soon.

  • Our Team Currently -
